home.description: A lightweight, powerful, and production-ready boilerplate for building modern static websites. Powered by Pug, SCSS, and ES6+

webpack.title: Webpack 5
webpack.description: Fully configured Webpack build system with Hot Module Replacement (HMR) for a fast development experience.

pug.title: Pug Templating
pug.description: Write cleaner HTML using Pug (formerly Jade). Includes layout inheritance, mixins, and variable support.

theming.title: SCSS & Theming
theming.description: Built-in support for SASS/SCSS. Features a custom flexible grid system and CSS Variables for easy Dark/Light mode switching.

js.title: JavaScript ES6+
js.description: Modern JavaScript support via Babel. Write modular code using ES6 imports/exports comfortably.

asset.title: Asset Management
asset.description: Automatic handling of images, fonts, and static assets. Optimized for production builds.

architecture.title: Clean Architecture
architecture.description: Organized folder structure separating logic, styles, and views. scalable for small to medium projects.

basic.title: 1. Basic Grid
basic.description: Two columns split the row evenly. Each .col-6 spans half of the 12‑column grid, so the layout shows two equal blocks side by side.

responsive.title: 2. Responsive Example
responsive.description: Columns adapt to screen size. On small screens, each block uses .col-12 and spans the full width. On medium and larger screens, .col-md-6 makes them half‑width, so they sit side by side.
responsive.columnText: Full width on mobile, half on desktop

columns.title: 3. Three Columns
columns.description: Three equal columns in one row. Each .col-4 spans four of the twelve grid columns, resulting in three evenly sized blocks across the row.

width.title: 4. Full Width Column
width.description: A single block spans the entire row. Using .col-full applies grid-column: 1 / -1, so the element stretches across all available columns.

offset.title: 5. Offset Example
offset.description: Column shifted to the right. .col-4 defines the width, while .offset-2 adds a left margin equal to two grid columns, creating spacing before the block.

reOffset.title: 6. Responsive Offset
reOffset.description: Offset applied only on larger screens. On mobile, the block is .col-6 (half width). On medium screens and above, it becomes .col-md-4 with .offset-md-2, so it shifts right by two columns while keeping a narrower width.
reOffset.columnText: Responsive offset: on desktop shifted by 2 columns
